author: Lauren Roberts
title: 'Our schools are safe places': Territory schools to stay open
description: Premiers across Australia are asking parents to keep kids home from school to prevent COVID-19 spread. In the NT, it's still up to families to decide. Here's why.
content:
Posted 
March 26, 2020 18:19:25
Schools in the Northern Territory will stay open and go pupil-free for the last week of term despite earlier calls from the teachers' union to close classrooms earlier for most students.
Key points:
